citations.narrative:
At the time of inspection, the Institutional Animal Care & Use Committee (IACUC) paperwork, program of veterinary care,
and contingency plan were not available for review and examination by APHIS officials. The facility was asked to provide
the paperwork but was unable to do so in a timely manner.
Review of IACUC paperwork and other documents ensures that the IACUC is functioning as intended. Required records,
as outlined in the Animal Welfare Act and regulations, must be available for an APHIS official to review at the time of
inspection.
To be corrected by August 13, 2025
This inspection and exit interview were conducted with facility representatives.
n

narrative:
2.38(b)(1)(ii) 
   
Miscellaneous. 
At the time of inspection, the Institutional Animal Care & Use Committee (IACUC) paperwork, program of veterinary care, 
and contingency plan were not available for review and examination by APHIS officials. The facility was asked to provide 
the paperwork but was unable to do so in a timely manner. 
 
Review of IACUC paperwork and other documents ensures that the IACUC is functioning as intended. Required records, 
as outlined in the Animal Welfare Act and regulations, must be available for an APHIS official to review at the time of 
inspection.  
 
To be corrected by August 13, 2025 
 
This inspection and exit interview were conducted with facility representatives.
